content.description: A regression analysis was conducted to investigate the relationship between the total charge and travel time for a certain car service. Computer output from a linear regression analysis is shown below. The analysis was performed on a sample of 24 observations.
content.question: Term <math alttext="coefficient" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle mathvariant="bold"><mrow><mtext>Coef</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> <math alttext="standard error of the coefficient" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle mathvariant="bold"><mrow><mtext>SE Coef</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> Constant <math alttext="negative 1.55" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo>âˆ’</mo><mn>1.55</mn></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> 0.945 Travel time 0.22 0.023 Assume that the conditions for inference for the slope of the regression equation have been met. Which of the following defines the margin of error of a 90 percent confidence interval for the slope of the least-squares regression line?

topic.text: 9.2: Confidence Intervals for the Slope of a Regression Model

skill.text: Skill 3.D: Construct a confidence interval, provided conditions for inference are met.
